availableExpiration(bytes32).details: return available expiration time for the account

returns._0: available expiration time for the account

balanceOf(bytes32).details: return ipfs storage amount for the account

returns._0: ipfs storage amount for the account

expandedFee(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: calculate fee for storage and expiration

expansions(bytes32,uint256,uint256).details: calculate fee for storage and expiration

expiration(bytes32).details: return total expiration time for the account

returns._0: total expiration time for the account

expiredAt(bytes32).details: return when the account will expire

isExpired(bytes32).details: return whether ipfs storage is expired for the account

returns._0: whether ipfs storage is expired for the account

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDstChainPayment(address).details: update dst chain payment contract address

startTime(bytes32).details: return ipfs storage start time for the account

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
